# IRIS Rarity Commitment

This release publishes the Merkle root committing to the rarity assignment for all 10,000 IRIS artworks.

**Merkle Root:** `84e33c53f809bb6b9234e7ec721cc93a5fda833540984c3ff47144b707112809`

Rarity tiers:
- Common (5000)
- Uncommon (3000)
- Rare (1500)
- Ultra Rare (400)
- Artist Edition (100)

Each activated owner can retrieve their proof from the IRIS Passport page.
